title: Large 3bd/2ba Beautifully Designed Smart Home at Springline- Book Now
posting_body: Springline is redefining downtown Menlo Park.
Bringing a resort-style campus with culinary destinations, creative offices, modern residences and a mix of outdoor experiences.

It's a destination and a journey - a place where you can collaborate and innovate, host clients, meet new people, live modern, share drinks and dinner, escape or encounter, and be a local in the coolest new neighborhood around.
Stainless Steel Appliance Suite with Gas Range, Electric Oven and Microwave
App-controlled Automatic Window Treatments select units
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
